title: Chapter 6H - Typical Applications
content:
Chapter 6H - Typical Applications

State Regulations

Notes to Figure 6H-4 Typical Application 4 Short Duration or Mobile Operations on a Shoulder

Notes to Figure 6H-6 Typical Application 6 Shoulder Work with Minor Encroachment

Notes to Figure 6H-17 Typical Application 17 Mobile Operations on a Two-Lane Road

Notes to Figure 6H-35 Typical Application 35 Mobile Operation on a Multi-Lane Road

Notes to Figure 6H-36 Typical Application 36 Lane Shift on a Freeway

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
